/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the backdrop. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, illuminating the scene with natural light and highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
